enhanced_by.reason: The hasText method checks if the element has non-blank text content, which is similar to the functionality provided by the text method.
The ownText method retrieves the text owned by the element itself, which can be used to enhance the hasText method by providing a more granular check.
The isBlank method checks if a text node is blank, which can be used to construct assertions for the hasText method by verifying the presence of non-blank text nodes.
The text method retrieves the combined text of the element and its children, which can be used to assert the presence of text content in the hasText method.
